text:
Indian shares once again declined, after a one-day gain blip on Friday, amid weak Asian trading on a day most major global markets are closed for a holiday.The S&P BSE Sensex declined 0.9 percent to 25,810 while the NSE Nifty dropped 0.9 percent as well to 7,916, below the Brexit day low.






Here are the stocks moving the markets this morning:
title: Stocks Radar: ONGC, Bajaj Hindustan, M&M; And More
